name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pikbot : bulk ai image genaration tool for freepik pikaso

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pikbot is a bulk image generation tool for freepik pikaso. It helps you to generate multiple images at once.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pikbot: Bulk Image Generation Tool for Freepik & Pikaso
Pikbot is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your image generation process, perfect for users of Freepik and Pikaso. With Pikbot, you can generate multiple images in bulk using simple English prompts, hashtags, and emojis, all while ensuring your images are SEO-friendly.
Key Features:
Bulk Image Generation: Create multiple images at once, saving you time and effort.
Simple English Prompts: Use straightforward English to describe your desired images.
